ProteinName	PRKR-interacting protein 1
GeneName	PRKRIP1
Length	184
Function	Required for pre-mRNA splicing as component of the spliceosome (PubMed:28502770, PubMed:30705154). Binds double-stranded RNA. Inhibits EIF2AK2 kinase activity (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Nucleus; Nucleolus
